casebody.data:
HAMLET H.M.A., LLC
v.
HERNANDEZ 425A18-1 Supreme Court of North Carolina. June 25, 2019 Mark L. Hayes, Attorney at Law, Greensboro, for Hernandez, Pedro (M.D.) William S. F. Freeman, Attorney at Law, Rebecca C. Huntington, Attorney at Law, for Hamlet H.M.A., LLC D/B/A Sandhills Regional Medical Center. Linwood Jones, Attorney at Law, Raleigh, for N.C. Healthcare Association. Ryan Y. Park, Deputy Solicitor General, K. D. Sturgis, Special Deputy Attorney General, Daniel Paul Mosteller, Attorney at Law, Laura H. McHenry, Assistant Attorney General, for State of North Carolina. Jonathan Wall, Attorney at Law, Greensboro, Laura J. Wetsch, Attorney at Law, Raleigh, for NC Advocates for Justice.

Amended

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 24th of June 2019 by North Carolina Advocates for Justice for leave to file Amicus Curiae Brief: "Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference, this the 25th of June 2019." Unless already submitted, the Amicus Brief shall be submitted to the court within the times allowed and in the manner provided by Appellate Rule 28(i). Davis, J. recused.
